Translations.Text: You jing ren a! Nimen weisheme yao guyi yijialuanzhen, yincang zhenli ne?
You jing ren zhong de yixie ren shuo:“Nimen ke zai zaoshang xinyang jiang shi gei xinshimen de [jingdian], dan nimen zai wanshang jiu ying fouren ta, yibian tamen fanhui yuan jiao.

Nimen zhi neng xinren zunxing nimen de zongjiao zhe.” Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“[Zhenzheng de] zhengdao que shi an la de zhengdao.[Nimen buyao xiangxin] youren hui shou ci xiang nimen suo shou ci de [qishi],[chufei ta zunxing nimen de zongjiao], fouze,[fuhuo ri] tamen bi zai nimen de zhu nali tong nimen zhenglun.” Ni shuo:“Enhui quan zai an la de zhangguan zhong, ta ba enhui ci gei tasuo yiyu zhe.” An la shi kuan en de, quanzhi de.
Ta [an la] ba ta de enhui te ci gei tasuo yiyu zhe. An la shi you zhongda enhui de zhu.

You jing ren zhong you de ren, jiaru ni xintuo ta yi da dui huangjin, ta hui ru shu hai gei ni; tamen zhong you de ren, jishi ni xintuo ta yi mei jinbi, ta ye bu hui hai gei ni, chufei ni yizai suoyao, zhe shi yinwei tamen shuo:“Women shixin yu wenmang zhe [a wei bo ren] shi bu shou zebei de.” Tamen guyi jie an la de mingyi shuohuang.
Bu, shei luxing nuoyan bing jingwei, an la dique xihuan jingwei zhe.

Fan yi an la de xu yue he ziji de shiyan huanqu disu daijia de ren, zhexie ren zai houshi jue meiyou fu fen [zhu 1][jin leyuan]. Fuhuo ri, an la ji butong tamen jianghua, ye bu kanwang tamen he jinghua tamen. Tamen bi shou tongku de xingfa [zhu 2].
